description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Noyd is a new artificially intelligent game playing prodigy. Every artificial neuron in Noyd's artificial brain is designed to crush you. Noyd doesn't think you'll be able to beat Noyd in one game, let alone the 15 Noyd is capable of playing. Warning: Noyd has been known to have a few tricks up Noyd's sleeves.
